comments.body: The route setup can be generic, the actual version data isn't. Compare https://github.com/openshift/origin/blob/a58b6d87f531075ce9b9d3caffca66c00dfcab59/pkg/cmd/server/origin/master.go#L361-L361.
We can factor that in a follow-up PR.

> The route setup can be generic, the actual version data isn't. Compare https://github.com/openshift/origin/blob/a58b6d87f531075ce9b9d3caffca66c00dfcab59/pkg/cmd/server/origin/master.go#L361-L361.

That's of dubious value.  Setting this endpoint for another server will break `kubectl` nearly 100% of the time and openshift wouldn't use this since we'd have different routes anyway.

I'm ok with the code for the route living in generic, but I don't think it should be called from the genericapiserver code.  Let the caller set it.
Moved it to the master package. I think there it belong right now if is not generic.
